summary: A whole variety of open books to make your mod look amazing.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/42362-1-1379305998.png[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/42362-1-1379309782.png[/img][/center]

[size=5][center]I always loved [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?]Blary's[/url] mod [u][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14134/?tab=4&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D14134%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D634853&pUp=1]OpenBooks Resource[/url][/u].[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]I felt like it added a lot to the mods that used it, so I thought that I could make a whole bunch of new pages for the books in the hope that even more people would use these resources in their mods.[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]There are a total of 24 static open books. Each book has two visible custom made pages. (Which makes a total of 48 pages of awesome stuff!)[/center][/size]

[size=3][center]This is only a modders resource. [u]There is no esp file![/u] This does not add these books into the game. You must do this yourself.[/center][/size]

[size=5][center][u]Featured In[/u][/center][/size]

[size=5][center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46368/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D46368%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Riverside Ranch[/url][/center][/size]

[size=5][center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45387/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D45387%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Old Oak[/url][/center][/size]

[size=5][center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45559/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D45559%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Hilltop House[/url][/center][/size]

[size=5][center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33939/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D33939%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Elysium Estate[/url][/center][/size]

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/42362-1-1379307785.png[/img][/center]

[size=3][center]Version History:
1.1 First Release
1.2 Attempt to fix bug with texture paths
1.3 After some help from insaneplumber, DanielCoffey, and LP1 I believe the texture path problem has been fixed[/center][/size]

[size=4][center][u]Permissions[/u][/center][/size]

[size=3][center]Use these resources for your Mods! However, please credit myself and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?]Blary[/url] if you plan on publishing your mod. Also it would be nice to send me a message letting me know so that I can see your mod! Any pictures of the books in game that you take would be very appreciated.[/center][/size]


[size=4][center][u]Credits[/u][/center][/size]

[size=3][center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?]Blary[/url]: For the meshes and original idea without which this would not be possible.
All the Folks at DeviantART: Obsidian Dawn @ www.osidiandawn.com, Scully7491.deviantart.com, DarkNova666.deviantart.com, Leichnam.deviantart.com, nomuh.deviantart.com, calthyechild.deviantart.com, Psycho--Princess.deviantart.com, ephedrina-stock.deviantart.com, NamelessPL.deviantart.com, paradoxstock.deviantart.com, GoldDragonfly.deviantart.com, zoomanchoo.deviantart.com, StarRaven.deviantart.com, mawstock.deviantart.com, and remittancegirl.deviantart.com[/center][/size]
author: stoverjm
